yaml.title: Testing GitHub actions for upload
yaml.subtitle: Will this publish without me doing anything except a commit?
yaml.descrption: My aim here is to get the article to appear on the demo website without me needing to do anything. Let's see if it works
yaml.author: Brian Tarran

markdown.markdown:
So, this is the big moment. Can I use GitHub Actions to update the website without having to run anything myself. If I can, I'll be super happy.


What if I can't? Well, I'll just have to try something else.

## Will you be disappointed?

Yes, but it's all trial and error. I'm sure I'll get it working eventually.

## Conclusion

Fingers crossed!

:::{.column-body}
![](images/airpunch.png)
:::
